title: SET_HELI_TAIL_BOOM_CAN_BREAK_OFF
content:
0x3EC8BF18AA453FE90x2916D69B// SetHeliTailBoomCanBreakOff
void SET_HELI_TAIL_BOOM_CAN_BREAK_OFF(Vehicle heli, BOOL toggle);Parameters:heli: The helicopter for which the tail boom can break off.toggle: Determines whether the helicopter's tail boom can break off.Enables or disables the ability for a helicopter's tail boom to break off.NativeDB Introduced: v323Old name:  SET_HELI_TAIL_EXPLODE_THROW_DASHBOARDOld name:  WAS_COUNTER_ACTIVATEDExamples:LuaJavaScriptC#local heli = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
if heli == 0 or GetVehicleType(heli) ~= "heli" then return end

SetHeliTailBoomCanBreakOff(heli, true)
codeBlocks:
// SetHeliTailBoomCanBreakOff
void SET_HELI_TAIL_BOOM_CAN_BREAK_OFF(Vehicle heli, BOOL toggle);

local heli = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
if heli == 0 or GetVehicleType(heli) ~= "heli" then return end

SetHeliTailBoomCanBreakOff(heli, true)
